summary:
Description 
----------------
this mod add a new world
it\'s just a small flat place surrounded by water like a small island 
to build whatever you want to build 
personally i use it to play with Tundra Defense 
since in my opinion i really can\'t find any place to play with this awesome mod around skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Announcement
----------------------
I\'m really sorry for the late updates but this is my first mod ever and there is a lot of things that i really have no idea about it and i just find myself discovering it every now and then 

V3.2 will have a whole new dungeon since the last one i didn\'t like at all and had a lot of things that needed to be fixed so changed the whole thing
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
New Future Plans
--------------------------
1- make it a portal teleportation to the small island not a door inside a dungeon 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description 
----------------
this mod add a new world
it\'s just a small flat place surrounded by water like a small island 
to build whatever you want to build 
personally i use it to play with Tundra Defense 
since in my opinion i really can\'t find any place to play with this awesome mod around skyrim
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
installation requirement 
-----------------------------------
the original Skyrim patch 1.9
nothing more nothing less 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
how to instal this mod
--------------------------------
if manually
1- download this file manually
2-extract the file using winrar or 7-zip
3-put it inside the data folder
and don\'t forget to check if it was marked to load or not inside the skyrim launcher
if you are using NMM
1-download using NMM
2-install it as any other mod
P.S the load order is not required except that you must put it after the master file skyrim
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known Bugs
------------------
some NPCs doesn\'t move at all in the small island (i\'m working on it)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans
------------------
1-make the island looks nicer (Very soon ;) ) V4
2-change the enter location (Done :D) 
3-put a dungeon before you enter the island location (Done :D )
4-make it look a bit realistic not just a door and there you are (Done :D ) V3.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits 
-----------
ah...................
i made it so i think the credits goes to me O.o
although i\'m not sure  
anyway enjoy the mod and the following update
author: hamada147

files.name: small island
files.changelogHtml: Needs some things to be added and it will be added sooner or later

files.changelogHtml: add sort of dungeon that you have to enter first before you enter the small island

files.changelogHtml: fixed some things i didn't notice while creating the dungeon

files.changelogHtml:
v2.2 will have some more fixes to some things that was placed wrong

V3 will be delayed sorry about that

files.changelogHtml:
last fix so far
going to work on V3 tomorrow

files.name: small island V3
files.changelogHtml:
changed the entrance location to underwater near the lady standing stone
sorry for the delay i was busy with a real life stuff

files.name: small island V3_1
files.changelogHtml:
this is the final update for anyone who wants a flat island without anything so hope you have a great time playing with it as for the people who want the island with some decoration it will be in V4
sorry for the late update but i was learning first then implying what i have learned

files.name: small island V3_2
files.changelogHtml:
changed the whole dungeon
changed the height of the island since it was too high
